name: neg2subd
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(co(cneg(c0), cmin, cneg(c1)), co(c1, cmin, c0)))

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(cneg(c0), cmin, cneg(c1)), co(c1, cmin, c0)), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(co(cneg(c0), cmin, cneg(c1)), co(c1, cmin, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(cneg(c0), cmin, cneg(c1)), co(c1, cmin, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(co(cneg(c0), cmin, cneg(c1)), co(c1, cmin, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(cneg(c0), cmin, cneg(c1)), co(c1, cmin, c0)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(co(cneg(c0), cmin, cneg(c1)), co(c1, cmin, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(co(cneg(c0), cmin, cneg(c1)), co(c1, cmin, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))

comment: Relationship between subtraction and negative. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
